msbt.message: So this is the informative statue? The one with the same information written in three languages? Huh. For some reason, I thought it would look more like a set of dictionaries, .
I love this lady's look. Her outfit is casual, yet elegant. Polished, yet completely thrown together. Hmm But there's still something missing. I can't just quite put my finger on it.
Wow! This guy's abs are rock solid. Literally.'Cause, you know, he's made of rock. It gives him a natural advantage.
Is this who I think it is?Do you think when she sat for this painting, she knew how famous she might become one day? Talk about timeless celebrity!
These angels remind me of Blathers and how he dotes on all his exhibits with such care and adoration. And, oh yeah. Wings!
This painting has existed for centuries and been gazed upon by countless admirersincluding me. I'd count us both lucky.
There's a lot going on in this one. Who's the— And where's the—I'm confused.
The woman in this image is so valiantso powerful. She looks like such a magnetic leader. I would follow her anywhere.
I really love this painting. I'm always struck by how much beauty there can be in sadness.

If I only had one word to describe this mysterious painting, it would be "mysterious," obviously. If I had two words, they would be "dark" and "intense."And if I had five words? "I won't be sleeping tonight."
Looking at the calm painting here always calms my soul, .It reminds me of 's landscape and chill vibes.
The brushstrokes are so unique in the twinkling painting. They pull you into the image on the canvas I not only see the starry sky the artist has captured here, I can truly feel it, !
When I look at how the waves swirl in the dynamic painting, I almost feel seasick. They're just that evocative! On second thought, it could just be something I ate.
Is it just me, or does it look like this warrior statue is about to start moving? The detail is incredible Wait! Did it just move? I swear! You saw it too, right? Tell me you saw that, !
This ancient statue is preserved remarkably well for a piece this old.I wonder what kind of moisturizer Blathers uses on it
I've heard that a lot of folks have theories regarding the background and meaning of the familiar statue. Know what I say? Don't overthink it. That's not really the point of this kind of thing.
Oh, ! Is it true that you donated this piece?<10_4 /> Well, then Thanks, ! I'm normally not the art-loving type. But thanks to your donation, I'm a changed .
